content.p: Our sports clubs are at the heart of sport here. With over 70 different clubs to choose between, there's something for everyone to try from beginner to elite athlete. The University of Nottingham has a fantastic range of sports clubs to choose from - whatever you're interested in, there will be something for you! Our clubs represent the University of Nottingham in our Green and Gold kit, but several offer beginner and social sessions alongside their competitive teams. You can use the club A-Z finder on the page to find more information about each sports club. Many clubs host tasters and assessment days at the beginning of the academic year and during Refreshers (highlighted below) but there's often opportunities to get involved throughout the season. Windsurf Taster | 28/09/2024 Nottingham County Sailing Club 11am - 4pm Cost: Â£5 Windsurf Taster | 05/10/2024 If you would like to sign up to one of these taster sessions then please email windsurf@uonsu.com. +44 (0)115 748 7000 sport@nottingham.ac.uk Find our opening times here.
